scripts.start: npm run local-tunnel | npm run local
scripts.test: find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' | NODE_ENV=test entr -c mocha --require test/test_helper.js --full-trace test/**
scripts.deploy-production: git push kooragang HEAD:master && heroku run knex migrate:latest --app kooragang && git push kooragang-api HEAD:master && git push kooragang-hud HEAD:master
scripts.deploy-stage: git push kooragang-stage HEAD:master && heroku run knex migrate:latest --app kooragang-stage && git push kooragang-api-stage HEAD:master
